glsa.title: ClamAV: Denial of service
glsa.synopsis: ClamAV is vulnerable to Denial of Service.

background.p: ClamAV is a GPL virus scanner.

description.p: Hendrik Weimer discovered that ClamAV fails to properly handle deeply nested MIME multipart/mixed content.

impact.p: By sending a specially crafted email with deeply nested MIME multipart/mixed content an attacker could cause ClamAV to crash.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All ClamAV users should upgrade to the latest version:
